data.name: Candies for friends
data.description: # Description Angela has a box with N candies in it. She wanted to share these candies with her N friends. Everyone with whom Angela shared should have the same amount of candy. For example, if Angela has 4 candies, she can split them between 4 friends: - 1 candy for each friend - between 2 friends (2 candies each) - all candies to one friend total 3 ways to divide 4 candies between 4 friends If Angela has 7 candies and 7 friends: - 1 candy for each friend - all candies to one friend And finally, if Angela has 10 candies and 10 friends: - 1 candy for each friend - all candies to one friend - 5 candies between 2 friends - 2 candies between 5 friends # Task Write a function candies_for_friends that takes n - number of candies in a box, and returns the number of ways to divide the candies between n friends. 0 ≤ n ≤ 1000 Good Luck! // Adapted from the Informatics Olympiad
